p: MIC data of the antimicrobial compounds and M. piperita EO were converted into Fractional Inhibitory Concentration (FIC), determined using the formula FIC = (MIC A combination/MIC A alone). MIC values for the EO-drugs associations were defined as the lowest concentration at which no visible growth of the microbial strains could be detected compared to their growth in the control well, as described in Eucast document [ 48].
